item.title: Blogging with Emacs Org
item.description: .ox-hugo-toc ul { list-style: none; } Table of Contents 1 Writing with Emacs Org publish 2 Writing with Hugo 2.1 architecture of the site 3 Settings for ox-hugo 3.1 settings for each section based on ox-hugo 3.2 settings for each article based on ox-hugo 4 Settings for Hugo themes Right Now, I use two blog systems to post articles.
